purpose: To provide observability, metrics, and management tools for large language models (LLMs) to enhance development and deployment workflows.
principle: Integrates with popular LLM frameworks and tools like Langchain and OpenAI SDK to monitor and manage LLM performance and usage.
reusability: Offers integration with OpenTelemetry and various LLM frameworks, providing APIs and plugins for extensibility.
limitations: Primarily focused on LLMs, may not support other AI/ML models or frameworks outside the LLM ecosystem.
name: langfuse
description: ü™¢ Open source LLM engineering platform: LLM Observability, metrics, evals, prompt management, playground, datasets. Integrates with OpenTelemetry, Langchain, OpenAI SDK, LiteLLM, and more. üçäYC W23
highlight: Comprehensive LLM observability and management platform with integration capabilities.
